response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its worth to you, I am offering it at a special price tailored to ensure both of us benefit. I kindly propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer not only allows you to acquire an asset valued at $1,000,000 at a competitive rate but also ensures a significant profit margin for me. I look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
